```{r DataName.lm}
DataName.lm = lm(ResponseName~BlockingName+FactorName, data = DataName)
anova(DataName.lm)
```


```{r plotDataName.lm, fig.cap="Residual analysis for DataName.lm"}
library(ggfortify)
autoplot(DataName.lm)
```


```{GetMeans}
library(emmeans)
emmeans(DataName.lm, pairwise ~FactorName)
```
